documentation.description: Get anomaly detection job model snapshot upgrade usage info

job_id.description: The ID of the job. May be a wildcard, comma separated list or `_all`.

snapshot_id.description: The ID of the snapshot. May be a wildcard, comma separated list or `_all`.

allow_no_match.description: Whether to ignore if a wildcard expression matches no jobs or no snapshots. (This includes the `_all` string.)
